titleJp: タクティクル・シューター・エンジン
description: Tactical Shooter Engine is an OpenGL-based first-person game engine written in C++ and developed by Parker Smith. The engine currently implements many features essential to the tactical shooter genre such as gravity and collision physics, hitscan collision detection, weapon dropping/picking up, and bombsites/bomb planting to name a few. From a graphical standpoint the engine also implements the ability to add post-processing effects such as anti-aliasing. The engine is currently a work-in-progress-on-indefinite-hold.

minimum.processor: Intel Core i5-7500 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
minimum.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1030 or AMD Radeon RX 570

recommended.processor: Intel Core i7-10700 or AMD Ryzen 5 5600
recommended.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 590
